programme.title: DP World Tour Golf
programme.desc: FedEx Open de France final-round play from Golf de Saint-Nom-La-Bretche in Paris. This course last hosted the French Open in 1982, with Seve Ballesteros prevailing. Englishman Dan Bradbury was last year's winner.

programme.title: Golf Films
programme.desc: Retelling the story of the 106th Open Championship at Turnberry, the titanic tussle between Jack Nicklaus and Tom Watson, in 1977. The film interweaves rich archival footage with contemporary interviews and animated scenes, chronicling a tournament that helped transform golf from conservative to cool.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Top young teacher Devan Bonebrake arms viewers with the practice drills, on-course strategies and even equipment tips needed to play their best golf ever.

programme.title: Korn Ferry Tour Golf
programme.desc: Nationwide Children's Hospital Championship final-round play from the Ohio State Scarlet Course in Columbus, Ohio. Last year's winner was 13-under-par in this second of four events in the Korn Ferry Tour Finals, which finalize the Top 20 in the standings who earn 2026 PGA Tour cards. Only the top 120 in points advance to next week's third event.

programme.title: LPGA Tour Golf
programme.desc: Walmart NW Arkansas Championship final-round play from Pinnacle CC in Rogers, Ark. Thailand's Jasmine Suwannapura (17-under-par) prevailed here last year after a playoff vs. American Lucy Li. Local favorite Stacy Lewis announced this week that this is her final LPGA season.

programme.title: PGA Tour Champions Golf
programme.desc: PURE Insurance Championship final-round play from famed Pebble Beach Golf Links and Spyglass Hill GC on California's Monterey Peninsula. England's Paul Broadhurst (14-under-par) prevailed last year by three shots over Alex Cejka.

programme.title: Dunston Checks In
programme.desc: Comedy starring Faye Dunaway and Rupert Everett. A hotel owner's attempt to upgrade her star rating is undermined by the arrival of a master thief and his light-fingered orangutan.

programme.title: Secret Headquarters
programme.desc: Family comedy with Michael Pea. A young lad discovers that his slacker dad is a superhero. And before he's got used to the idea, he must foil a villain's plot to bring his dad down.

programme.title: Fisherman's Friends
programme.desc: Heart-warming comedy based on the real-life story of the Cornish folk ensemble who took the UK charts by storm in 2010, starring Daniel Mays and Tuppence Middleton.

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: Sin City thriller with Jason Statham. A compulsive gambler who does favours for money just wants out of the Vegas life. Just one big win at the tables should do it..

programme.title: Glass
programme.desc: M. Night Shyamalan directs an all-star cast in this genre-bending superhero sequel. Three superhumans team up to escape a psychiatric ward. With Bruce Willis in a cagoule.

programme.title: Benjamin
programme.desc: Simon Amstell's bittersweet comedy romance stars Colin Morgan as a young filmmaker angsting over his second feature when he falls for a French music student.

programme.title: The Winslow Boy
programme.desc: Anthony Asquith's drama based on a famous 1912 court case with Cedric Hardwicke as the father of a boy accused of theft who pursues the case to the highest courts. With Robert Donat.

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: Historical drama with Ralph Richardson. A retelling of the stand made at Thermopylae in 480 BC by a small Greek force against invasion by an enormous Persian army.

programme.title: The Devil at 4 O'Clock
programme.desc: Drama. Spencer Tracy stars as an unfairly unpopular priest living on a volcanic South Sea island which is about to erupt. With Kerwin Matthews, Frank Sinatra and Barbara Luna.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: Roland Emmerich's sprawling, action-packed war drama about the Battle of Midway, a major turning point in World War II. Starring Ed Skrein, Luke Evans and Woody Harrelson.

programme.title: Infinite
programme.desc: Sci-fi action. Mark Wahlberg discovers that his hallucinations are memories from past lives. There are others like him, but they don't all have good intentions..

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: Outrageous satirical comedy from the South Park team. A crack team of puppets battle to save the world from an evil terrorist plot hatched by North Korean leader Kim Jong Il.

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: Real-life drama with Denzel Washington. In trying to uncover the reason for recruit Antwone Fisher's violence, a naval psychiatrist uncovers a history of child abuse.

programme.desc: The Owls face the No. 18 Yellow Jackets at Bobby Dodd Stadium. Georgia Tech is off to its first 3-0 start since 2016 after upsetting then-No. 12 Clemson 24-21 at home Sept. 13. Jackets quarterback Haynes King ran for 103 yards and a TD in the win.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: All the action from college football.

programme.title: USA Mullet Championships
programme.desc: See who sport's the best freedom flapper, modern mullet, Tennessee top hat and other styles of lenghty man locks at the 2020 Mullet Championship.

programme.title: NHRL Teams: Robot Fighting Championship
programme.desc: Action between technological contraptions in the Robot Fighting Championship.

programme.title: TSN's The Ocho
programme.desc: A collection of unusual and offbeat sports programming often geared towards the summer, named for the fictitious channel from the movie "Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story.".

programme.title: Crossnet Sand Series
programme.desc: Hitting the beach for an emerging sport with elements of four square and volleyball with a centrally-placed net and four-quadrant court. Players are eliminated as the game goes along and the winner is the first player in square four to 11 points.

programme.title: Franklin Rock River Stone Skipping Tournament
programme.desc: Objective is to see how many times the stone can bounce before it sinks.

programme.title: 2022 Noblesville Bed Races
programme.desc: Few sports let you lie down on the job, and none are half as exciting as bed racing. Pitting young against old, police against firemen, see the spectacle of souped-up sleepers swiftly sprinting their way to glory in the Noblesville (Ind.) Bed Races.

programme.title: eSkootr Championship 2022
programme.desc: London hosts the inaugural championship of the world's first electric scooter racing series.

programme.title: U.S. Air Guitar All-Star Air-Off
programme.desc: Five of the greatest U.S. Air Guitar champions go head to head in an epic, four-round elimination battle in Rock Hill, S.C. Included are reigning and past national champs, and one wild-card veteran.

programme.title: Grass Drag Racing Season Opener
programme.desc: A field of 146 entries drag race on a 500-foot grass course in stock, trail, and modified snowmobiles.

programme.title: AWA Wiffle Ball at The Ocho
programme.desc: All-Stars from the American Wiffle Association square off on "The Ocho" in Rock Hill, S.C.

programme.title: Slippery Stairs at The Ocho
programme.desc: Call it controlled chaos as contestants are challenged with unpredictable steps, slippery slime, dodging balls while desperately trying to be the first one to the top. It's Slippery Stairs from The Ocho in Rock Hill, S.C.

programme.title: U.S. Quadball Invitational
programme.desc: The U.S. National Team faces the Development Team in Quadball from Rock Hill, S.C., as part of "The Ocho" programming. The stick and ball sport is inspired by Quidditch from the Harry Potter series.

programme.title: 2022 Pro Breaking Tour Invitational
programme.desc: Athletes from the Pro Breaking Tour demonstrate their moves at The Ocho in Rock Hill, S.C., showcasing one of the new Olympic events at the 2024 Games in Paris.

programme.title: 2022 BullShooter Invitational Shootout
programme.desc: Top darts players take aim in Rock Hill, S.C., competing in 501 Open In/ Double Out, Split Bull, where they must win a best-of-five match, double elimination, to make it to the top four players.

programme.title: Formula One Racing
programme.desc: The Azerbaijan Grand Prix from 6km Baku City Circuit. Current points leader Oscar Piastri is defending champ of this 51-lap race as he nurses his 31-point lead over teammate Lando Norris. A not-as-distant third with eight races to go is reigning F1 champ Max Verstappen, who is coming off victory at Monza in his first win since May.

programme.title: Golden Tee World Championship
programme.desc: Masters of the classic golf video game compete for the 2019 title.

programme.title: Ultimate Tire Wrestling
programme.desc: Two big tractor tires. Two skilled wrestlers. One goal: stuff 51% of your opponent into the tire.

programme.title: Carjitsu Championship
programme.desc: It's Jiu-Jitsu, but inside of a car ? where every seatbelt and dashboard are used for leverage, and each round can only be won by submission.

programme.title: Speed Chess Championship Finals
programme.desc: The 2022 Speed Chess Championship Final represents the pinnacle of online speed chess, featuring intense competition, brilliant tactics, and time-pressured decision-making at the highest level of the game.

programme.title: ProSayulita SUP OPEN
programme.desc: The ProSayulita SUP OPEN brings together the best athletes and young competitors in SUP Surf, Long Distance and Technical races, in Sayulita, Nayarit, Mexico.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Memorable UFC fights between rivals are spotlighted.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: A look at the most memorable and successful returns to the Octagon for top MMA fighters.

programme.title: Spikeball
programme.desc: Four of the best Spikeball teams gather from across the country in Provo, Utah, to see if they can set, spike, and dive their way to a Spikeball championship.

programme.desc: The 2020 Classic Tetris World Championship.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.desc: In Rajasthan, Rob and Rylan try miniature painting and hear an alarming horoscope. Contains some strong language.

programme.desc: What is the state of the historic special relationship between the US and the UK.

programme.desc: Baltimore Ravens v Detroit Lions (Kick-off 1.15am). Coverage of the week three match at M&T Bank Stadium. These two sides last met back in October 2023 when the Ravens came away with an impressive 38-6 victory. The hosts scored points in every quarter while it took until the fourth quarter for the Lions to get something on the board. The visitors will be looking to improve on a record that has only seen them beat Baltimore once in their history.

programme.title: Fearless Freddie (2019)
programme.desc: Rear Admiral Frederick Burdett Warder was known for both his bravery and his humility. Warder was Skipper of the USS Seawolf submarine during WWII. A man who believed his enemy was also his brother, Warder ordered his crew to rescue enemy battle survivors from the sea even if they refused to come aboard. This documentary tells the story of Warder's remarkable life.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new late-night show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: College Football Final

programme.title: Fantasy Football Now
programme.desc: "Fantasy Football Now" airs live on Sunday mornings during the NFL season, a time when fans are making last-minute roster moves and need the latest news from around the league. Providing the latest info are host Field Yates, analysts Mike Clay and Damien Woody, and senior writer and injury analyst Stephania Bell. Also contributing to the show are ESPN's NFL reporters, who bring fantasy players the latest intel from game sites and, in many cases, straight from the coach's mouth to give fantasy owners everything they need to know to set their lineups.

programme.title: Baseball Tonight: Sunday Night Countdown
programme.desc: Leading into each of ESPN's Sunday Night Baseball telecasts is this special edition of "Baseball Tonight." Host Karl Ravech teams with analysts and reporters to present fans a detailed preview of the network's exclusive, national game of the week. Highlights of the day's other games, interviews with players and managers, and key storylines from around the league also fill the hourlong show. Mark Teixeira, Eduardo Prez, Tim Kurkjian and Buster Olney are among the analysts.
